Niharika Konidela Wiki | Movie | Age | Height | Boyfriend | Family | Profile

Bolly Reporter
10 months ago

Niharika Konidela is a promising Indian Film and Television Actress & Producer. She mainly works in Telugu and Tamil Films.

Biography & Wiki

Niharika Konidela’s nickname is Niha. She was born on born on 18 December 1993 in Hyderabad, Telangana, India. Hence, her current age is 26 years. Niharika’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height (approx.) in centimeters170 cm
Height in meters1.70 m
Height in feet inches5′ 7”
Weight (approx.) in kilograms50 kg
Weight in pounds110 lbs
Figure Measurements (approx.)32-26-34
Eye ColorDark Brown
Hair ColorBlack

Family Members

Her Father is Nagendra Babu who is an Actor & Producer and Her Mother is Padmaja Konidela. She has one brother named, Varun Tej who is an actor. Niharika Konidela is Unmarried and She is in a relationship with Actor Sai Dharam Tej. She confessed that she owes a lot to her father, Naga Babu, who has been a pillar of strength all her life. There are rumors that Niharika and her father Nagababu are looking for a good story and if they like and they are ready to produce for the movie.

Ram Charan, Akira Nandan, Aadhya Konidala, Chiranjeevi Sreeja, Chiranjeevi Sushmitha are her Cousins.

Education and School, College

She has completed her Graduation from St. Mary’s College, Hyderabad.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There is a rumor that Niharika Konidela has an affair with Telegu film actor Sai Dharam Tej. There is also a buzz in media that, she had a relationship with Baahubali star Venkata Satyanarayana Prabhas. But her family strictly denied that.

Niharika Konidela filmography

NNiharika started her career with the Telugu dance reality show Dhee Juniors 1 and Dhee Juniors 2 aired on ETV Telugu. After that, she acted and also produced the Telugu Web-Series Muddapappu Avakai. She was made her on-screen debut with the film ‘Oka Manasu‘ (2016). She also worked in Telugu films, Nanna Koochi (2017) and Upcoming film Happy Wedding (2018). Niharika Konidela is looking so pretty, talented and most popular for her mind bowling acting. She acted in a Tamil movie Oru Nalla Naal Paathu Solren in 2018

2016Muddapappu Avakai
2016Oka Manasu
2017Nanna Koochi
2018Oru Nalla Naal Paathu Solren

Salary and Net Worth

Niharika has an estimated net worth of almost $5 Million. She earns almost ₹25 lakh per movie she plays as salary.

Facts about Niharika Konidela

  • Niharika is the niece of Tollywood actors Chiranjeevi and Pawan Kalyan.
  • She was the host of the Telugu dance reality shows – Dhee Juniors 1 and Dhee Juniors 2 on ETV Telugu.
  • She has worked as an intern on a TV channel.
  • Before appearing on TV, she has worked with a theatre group and has also served in a coffee shop.
  • She has produced the web series- ‘Nanna Koochi’ and ‘Muddapappu Avakai’ in the Telugu language under her banner ‘Pink Elephant Pictures’ and has also acted in them. Allegedly, actor Sai Dharam Tej often visited the sets of Niharika’s debut movie ‘Oka Manasu’ and they got close to each other during that time.
